name: Training Car
description:
Have you ever dream to be the perfect driver ? Well this game is for you !

You will learn how to use your brakes correctly, and also how to anticipate the different obstacles in the road.

This Game was made during the July Chip N' Jam of 2020.

We were a duo to make this game (Maël Gaubicher and Timotée Bignon). I've made the Level building, and my teammate, made the coding.
